Display number of taxa without NCBI ID per attribute in physiology dataset

num_taxa_without_ncbi_per_attribute.Rd

Display number of taxa without NCBI ID per attribute in physiology dataset

num_taxa_without_ncbi_per_attribute(data, phys)

Arguments

data

a tibble object, converted from the output by the physiologies function and has been converted by the fetch_ranks function
phys

a string vector of the physiology name

Value

a ggplot

Examples

physiologies <- physiologies()

#> Finished animal pathogen
#> Finished antimicrobial resistance
#> Dropped 3054 rows with missing Attribute_value from antimicrobial sensitivity
#> Finished biofilm forming
#> Dropped 4 rows with missing Attribute_value from butyrate producing
#> Finished acetate producing
#> Finished lactate producing
#> Finished arrangement
#> Dropped 9304 rows with missing Attribute_value from shape
#> Finished COGEM pathogenicity rating
#> Finished mutation rate per site per generation
#> Finished mutation rates per site per year
#> Finished extreme environment
#> Finished gram stain
#> Finished growth medium
#> Finished growth temperature
#> Finished habitat
#> Finished optimal ph
#> Finished aerophilicity
#> Finished plant pathogenicity
#> Finished width
#> Dropped 1 rows with missing Attribute_value from spore shape
#> Finished isolation site
#> Finished disease association
#> Finished hydrogen gas producing
#> Finished length
#> Finished health associated
aer <- physiologies[["aerophilicity"]] %>%
as_tibble()
aer_ranks <- fetch_ranks(aer)

#> Error in fetch_ranks(aer): could not find function "fetch_ranks"
num_taxa_without_ncbi_per_attribute(aer_ranks, "aerophilicity")

#> Error in num_taxa_without_ncbi_per_attribute(aer_ranks, "aerophilicity"): could not find function "num_taxa_without_ncbi_per_attribute"
